entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -35.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
